mapper.select: select dashboard_data_id as id, dashboard_data_date as date, sales_cnt as salesCnt, sales_amount as salesAmount from dashboard_sales_data where dashboard_data_date >= DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL #{days} day) AND dashboard_data_date <= #{date}
select count(*) from user where DATE(user_create_date) = #{date}
select count(*) from user where DATE(user_create_date) < #{date}
